name: PUZZLE REPAIR
description:
Puzzle Repair is a Puzzle Horror Game made for the Godot Wild Jam #53. Repair three puzzles and have fun!

Edit: When using tools, follow your mouse cursor rather than the tool itself. I plan to fix this in the future.

Wild Cards:

4 Pallet Color Limit

Wait, What!?

Attributions:

Bone Crack

Creature Roar
